message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob.  This offer gets us both a good amount.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation will hit you harder
Bob, my offer is still generous considering the inflation. Let's close this deal and both get something!
Inflation is on my side, I'm willing to take a bit more. You should consider accepting before it's too late
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.  This inflation is no joke!
You're right, inflation is no joke... for you. I'll take a bigger share, thanks
Bob, this is getting painful. I'm willing to accept a smaller share, but I need you to meet me halfway.  Don't be greedy!
Painful for you, maybe. But I'm just getting started. You should've taken one of my previous offers
Bob, you're being unreasonable.  This is practically highway robbery! I'm offering you 60% - take it or leave it!
Highway robbery? You're the one who's been robbed by inflation. I'll take the lion's share, thanks
